short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a ninja-button next to the jira-issue ID that copies the ID to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a ninja-button next to the jira-issue ID that copies the ID to the clipboard.
Left click on the button copies the issue ID and issue title to the clipboard.
Right click on the button copies the issue ID to the clipboard.
